metadata.title: RHBA-2021:0639: virt:8.3 bug fix and enhancement update (Important)
metadata.description: The Advanced Virtualization module provides the user-space component for running virtual machines that use KVM in environments managed by Red Hat products.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-27617 QEMU: net: an assert failure via eth_get_gso_type
CVE-2020-25707 QEMU: infinite loop in e1000e_write_packet_to_guest() in hw/net/e1000e_core.c
assertion failure through usb_packet_unmap() in hw/usb/hcd-ehci.c
CVE-2020-27821 QEMU: heap buffer overflow in msix_table_mmio_write() in hw/pci/msix.c
CVE-2020-35517 QEMU: virtiofsd: potential privileged host device access from guest
CVE-2020-29443 QEMU: ide: atapi: OOB access while processing read commands
